title: Machine Learning Engineer (NLP)
description: We are hiring an Entry-Level Machine Learning Engineer with a focus on Natural Language Processing (NLP) to join our growing AI team in Karachi.
summary: Entry-Level Machine Learning Engineer with NLP focus
benefits: Access to internal workshops and learning resources
Career path in applied AI/NLP roles
responsibilities: Help gather, clean, and prepare text data for training
Implement basic NLP tasks such as tokenization, stemming, and vectorization
Support the team in training and evaluating simple models
Assist in building and refining chatbot and sentiment analysis modules
Document your code and findings clearly for future reference
Stay updated with new tools and practices in the NLP space
requirements: Strong foundation in machine learning principles and interest in NLP
Working knowledge of Python and basic NLP libraries like NLTK or spaCy
Problem-solving mindset with attention to detail
Willingness to learn and grow in a team environment
nice_to_have: Final year or capstone project in NLP or ML
Familiarity with pre-trained models or vector embeddings
Experience with Git, Jupyter Notebooks, or collaborative development
